title: RIP devourer twisted fate
body:
Sated Devourer

Ranged champions now proc the Phantom hit passive every fourth hit, increased from every second

http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/pbe-round-up-patch-5-19-46984/

replies.body: I'm pretty sure that Devourer is going to be disabled until that patch.
that works better for TF.... every 4th hit coincides with his passive E stacked deck
So does every second, plus some
